Hello whoever is reading this:
This is a bundle of my personal website, also my portofolio of recent works.
You can simply double click index.html and open it in google chrome to see the static version of the website, or you can go to http://www.nomosoro.com  to see the latest version of my personal website.
I strongly recommend you to check my online portofolio as they will be updated to latest version, also offering latest UI and information.
Thanks for reading and I hope you enjoy!
